attributes.title: Oompa Loompa
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It was very slow in loading the pages and once it did, a really loud siren sound was coming from my phone. It made my guinea pigs start flying around my room. Then they escaped my house and met up with their other guinea pig friends. Also, it has Donald Trump in it.ü§¢

attributes.title: absolutely horrible if i could give zero stars i would
attributes.review: this app is the absolute worst app imaginable. it took up way more storage then it said with ‚Äúpatch files‚Äù and then next thing i know all of my information is wiped and gone . and within opening the app is makes you agree to vote for trump no matter your political party to continue. and the amount of virus‚Äôs i got on my phone and the constant pop up ads is unreal . please please please do not download this app . it‚Äôs absolutely horrible .

attributes.title: Dissapointing
attributes.review: Everytime i try to load into the app it would freak out and kick me off the app and ive tried redownloading it and shutting off my phone but nothing works app doesnt even work dont even waste your time getting this absolute dissapointment

attributes.title: absolutely atrocious
attributes.review: first of all, this app took forever to download. second, as soon as I opened the app, it gave my phone a virus and I had to get a new one. the layout is not visually appealing or easy to use; whoever designed it must be a product of generations upon generations of inbreeding.

The navigation thru the app is all

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: If i could give 0 stars i would. The app took 2 days to load, my phone got hacked after signing up and my number got leaked! all of my contacts got changed so i don‚Äôt know who is who and i had to get a new phone because it got hacked. Do NOT download this app!
